archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: GI Interface(return); DB Schenker SAP --> Vestas SAP
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
Schenker is posting goods issue. This process is used when tools and spare parts are needed for a service on a turbine and are ​ delivered from main warehouse in Mutzschen
A outbound delivery is created by a batch job at Vestas side if the materials are available in the stock. ​ The outbound delivery is interfaced to Schenker by using the IDoc DELVRY03. ​ - Schenker creates a transfer order in their system based on the delivery that Schenker has received. ​Schenker sends information that they have started the pickup. This information is interfaced in the format ​DELVRY03 (Includes the qualifier PIC). ​ - When Schenker has picked up the materials they then make a post goods issue. This is interfaced to ​Vestas’ system using IDoc DELVRY03 including information regarding batches and serial numbers if the ​ materials need this information. ​ - During the GI confirmation all serial No. relevant items should be consolidated by Schenker: Schenker​ activated Batch Management for the SN relevant items (1SN = 1 Batch-No.). Because of batch split on ​Schenker side the consolidation is necessary.
Link to Documentation; https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/OneTool-T153PLrollout/Shared%20Documents/T15%203PL%20rollout/00%20Requirements%20and%20Process/Vestas%20-%20DB%20Schenker%20Interface.pptx?d=w8ae74256aee84e64a3c4764fa3b4d8bb&csf=1&web=1&e=PhplWf
